                            play cost of 6 or less. If you have a Digimon with 5
                            or more digivolution cards and [X-Antibody] in its
                            traits in play, you may delete 1 of your opponent's
                            Digimon without [X-Antibody] in its traits instead.
securityEffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: Calling From the Darkness
effect:
[Main] Delete 1 of your Digimon. Then, return up to
                            2 purple Digimon cards from your trash to your hand.
securityEffect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.

name: Schwarz Lehrsatz
effect:
[Main] For each Digimon with [Hybrid] in its traits
                            and each Tamer you have in play, delete 1 of your
                            opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon.
securityEffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: Dead or Alive
effect:
[Main] Play 1 purple level 5 Digimon card from your
                            trash without paying its memory cost. If there are
                            10 or more cards in your trash, you may play 1
                            Digimon card with [Lucemon] in its name without
                            paying its memory cost instead.
securityEffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: Evolution Ancient
effect:
If you have a Digimon with [Hybrid] in its traits in
                            play, you may use this Option card without meeting
                            its color requirements. [Main] Your level 4 Digimon
                            can digivolve into 1 Digimon card in your hand with
                            matching colors and [Ten Warriors] in its traits for
                            its digivolution cost, ignoring its level.
securityEffect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.

name: Takuya Kanbara
effect:
[Security] Play this card without paying its memory
                            cost. [Main][Once Per Turn] You may place 5 cards
                            with [Hybrid] in their traits from your trash under
                            this Tamer in any order to digivolve it into an
                            [EmperorGreymon] in your hand for its digivolution
                            cost as if this Tamer is a level 5 red Digimon.
inheritedEffect:
[Your Turn] This Digimon gets +2000 DP. While this
                            Digimon has 10000 DP or more, it gains ＜Security
                            Attack +1＞. (This Digimon checks 1 additional
                            security card.)

                            cost. [On Play] Trash 3 digivolution cards from the

name: Zoe Orimoto
effect:
[Security] Play this card without paying its memory
                            cost. [On Play] You may search your security stack
                            for 1 card with [Hybrid] or [Ten Warriors] in its
                            traits, reveal it, and add it to your hand. If you
                            added a card to your hand, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞.
                            (Place the top card of your deck on top of your
                            security stack.) Then, shuffle your security stack.
inheritedEffect:
[Opponent's Turn] All of your Security Digimon get
                            +3000 DP.

name: Kota Domoto
effect:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less,
                            set your memory to 3. [On Play] Reveal the top 4
                            cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [X-Antibody] in
                            its traits among them to your hand. Place the
                            remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any
                            order.
